name: Demeo Battles
abstract: Demeo Battles is a competitive turn-based strategy game for 1-4 players. Choose your champion, assemble an army of monstrous minions & team up with another champion in your quest for turn-based glory!

detail.app_languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
- Ranked Mode is now live! Available to all players after reaching level 5
    - Ranked matches are 1 vs 1, each player controlling both heroes
    - Each Ranked season will last a month
    - Fight through 5 placement matches to determine your starting rank each season, then battle your way through the leaderboard
- Special events begin!
    - Keep an eye out for special limited-time events- each event theme offers a suggested way to play, with certain creatures and cards discounted and more common in Cleeptoâ€™s shop
- 10 new single-player challenges
- New catalogue pages and unlockable items
    - New maps, skins, tombstones, and dice are now available
    - A new type of cosmetic item is here - card backs!
- Server status information is now shown when looking for a match
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
